column4: hello .is there any way you can clone your current wubi installation?
like creating an installation disk of your curernt packages. so that you dont need to download it all over again
and also .so when i install it to another pc .it has all the other stuff and settings so i don;t need to configure everything all over again
afaik, a wubi install is entirely found inside a folder on an ntfs partition called ubuntu. I wonder if you install wubi on another machine and then replace the ubuntu folder what would happen :P
